original_text: There were also other villages round the same towns, as far as Baalath town. Those were the places where they lived. They wrote down a list of the names of their ancestors.
korean_text: 또 모든 성읍 주위에 살던 주민들의 경계가 바알까지 다다랐으니 시므온 자손의 거주지가 이러하고 각기 계보가 있더라

sentences.original_text: There were also other villages round the same towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 같은 성읍 주위에 다른 촌락들도 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Those were the places where they lived
They wrote down a list of the names of their ancestors
